text: Pingali may refer to: *Pingali Venkayya (died 1963), an Indian freedom fighter *Pingali Nagendrarao (1901–1971), a Telugu scriptwriter, playwright and lyricist *Pingali Suranna (fl. 16th century), a Telugu poet *Pingali Lakshmikantamu (1894–1972), an Indian poet and writer *Pingali, Parbhani, a village in Maharashtra state of India Category:Surnames of Indian origin
title: Pingali
